scripts.db:memory: node -e "console.log('切换到内存数据库模式'); require('fs').writeFileSync('server.js', require('fs').readFileSync('server.js', 'utf8').replace(/database-sqlite/g, 'database-memory'));"
scripts.db:sqlite: node -e "console.log('切换到SQLite数据库模式'); require('fs').writeFileSync('server.js', require('fs').readFileSync('server.js', 'utf8').replace(/database-memory/g, 'database-sqlite'));"
